Package com.xebisco.yield

Class YldGraphics

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldGraphics
public class YldGraphics extends Object
It's a class that helps you create graphical objects

    • rect

      public Entity rect(float x, float y, float width, float height, boolean filled)
      Creates a rectangle entity.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the rectangle
      y - The y position of the rectangle
      width - The width of the rectangle
      height - The height of the rectangle
      filled - If the rectangle is filled.
      Returns:
      The created rectangle.

    • roundRect

      public Entity roundRect(float x, float y, float width, float height, boolean filled, Vector2 arc)
      Creates a round rectangle entity.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the rectangle
      y - The y position of the rectangle
      width - The width of the rectangle
      height - The height of the rectangle
      filled - If the rectangle is filled.
      arc - The arc size of the rectangle.
      Returns:
      The created rectangle.

    • setToConcurrent

      public void setToConcurrent(YldB toConcurrent)
      This function sets the value of the variable `toConcurrent` to the value of the variable `toConcurrent`
      Parameters:
      toConcurrent - The YldB object that will be used to create the concurrent YldB object.
